sentences.sContent: Approximate solutions were found for the rate of growth of a bubble in the process of intumescence.
sentences.sContent_eng: Approximate solutions were found for the rate of growth of a bubble in the process of intumescence.
sentences.sCn: 得到了膨胀过程中气泡生长速率的近似解。

sentences.sContent: Based on those experiments, a mathematic model of process of intumescence was established with the neglect of the transfer motion of the bubble.
sentences.sContent_eng: Based on those experiments, a mathematic model of process of intumescence was established with the neglect of the transfer motion of the bubble.
sentences.sCn: 在实验基础上，忽略气泡的迁移，建立了膨胀过程的数学模型。

sentences.sContent: There are lymph gland inflammation, malignant lymphoma and all kinds of metastatic cancer, which often cause intumescence of shallow lymph gland.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are lymph gland inflammation, malignant lymphoma and all kinds of metastatic cancer, which often cause intumescence of shallow lymph gland.
sentences.sCn: 淋巴结炎、恶性淋巴瘤，各种转移癌常引起颈部浅表淋巴结肿大。

words.tran: 膨胀的；肿大的；隆起的；泡沸的

trans.tranOther: a swelling up, as with blood or other fluid
